final_mermaid_code:
graph TD
    subgraph Customer
        A[Start] --> B[Drop-off location]
        B -->|Drive-through| C[Drop off prescription]
        B -->|Front counter| C[Drop off prescription]
        C --> D{Immediate fill?}
        D -->|Yes| E[Wait 15min - 1h]
        D -->|No| F[Nominate pickup time]
    end
    
    subgraph Technician
        G[Ask for pickup time] -.-> H[Place in time-labeled box]
        G --> I[Collect prescriptions for current hour]
        I --> J[Enter prescription details in system]
        J --> K[Perform automated DUR]
        K --> L{DUR alarm?}
        L -->|Yes| M[Pharmacist review]
        L -->|No| N[Perform insurance check]
    end
    
    subgraph Pharmacist
        N --> O[Review insurance check results]
        O --> P{Drug replacement needed?}
        P -->|Yes| Q[Call doctor/patient for replacements]
        P -->|No| R[Assign to technician for filling]
        R --> S{Need to call doctor?}
        S -->|Yes| T[Call doctor to confirm]
        S -->|No| U[Perform insurance check]
    end
    
    subgraph Technician2
        R --> V[Collect drugs and bag]
    end
    
    subgraph Pharmacist2
        V --> W[Double-check prescription]
        W --> X[Seal bag and place in pickup area]
    end
    
    subgraph Customer2
        Y[Arrive for pickup] --> Z[Retrieve prescription]
        Z --> AA{Payment needed?}
        AA -->|Yes| AB[Make payment]
        AA -->|No| AC[End]
        AB --> AC
    end
